ibis.io
Class SerializationBase

java.lang.Object
  ibis.io.IOProperties
      ibis.io.SerializationBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
Direct Known Subclasses:
ByteSerializationInputStream, ByteSerializationOutputStream
public class SerializationBase
extends IOProperties

A base class for all Ibis serialization classes, providing some method implementations that they share.
